feature_model.name: Mobile Phone, until relase 5

meta.data: First releases of Mobile Photo SPL. This feature model was created originally by Eduardo Figuereido in ICSE08 that also provides more releases.
Mauricio Alferez - Trascribed from Figueiredo. et.al at ICSE08
CITI, Departamento de informática, Universidade Nova de Lisboa

Eduardo Figueiredo, Nélio Cacho, Cláudio Sant'Anna, Mario Monteiro, Uirá Kulesza, Alessandro Garcia, Sérgio Soares, Fabiano Cutigi Ferrari, Safoora Shakil Khan, Fernando Castor Filho, Francisco Dantas: Evolving software product lines with aspects: an empirical study on design stability. ICSE 2008: 261-270

feature_model.feature_tree: :r MobilePhone(_r) :m Album Management(_r_1) :m Create Album(_r_1_2) :m Delete Album(_r_1_3) :m Photo Management(_r_4) :m Basic Photo Operations(_r_4_5) :m Create Photo(_r_4_5_6) :m Delete Photo(_r_4_5_7) :m View Photo(_r_4_5_8) :m Edit Photo Label(_r_4_5_9) :o Sorting(_r_4_10) :o Favorites(_r_4_11) :o Copy Photo(_r_4_13) :o SMS(_r_4_14)
